---
title: "SPP for ATN"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
ATN <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/ATN.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
atn <- ts(ATN[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+121/365.25)
atn %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(atn))
```

```{r}
training_atn <- subset(atn, end=length(atn)-3)
test_atn <- subset(atn, start=length(atn)-2)
fc_training_atn<-forecast(training_atn)
fc_training_atn %>%
  forecast(h=100) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_atn)
```

```{r}
fc_training_atn
```

```{r}
fc_atn<-forecast(atn)
fc_atn %>%
  forecast(h=26) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_atn
```

```{r}
accuracy(fc_atn)
```

```{r}
tail(atn)
min(atn)
max(atn)
which.min(atn)
```
